articles.summary: The 2026 NBA All-Star Game took place at Intuit Dome in Inglewood on Saturday afternoon with Los Angeles Lakers stars LeBron James and Luka Doncic involved in the event. The NBA decided to switch the format of this year’s All-Star Game, splitting the players into three teams, two USA and one World, to compete in […]

articles.original_title: LeBron’s Team Stripes falls in final of entertaining 2026 NBA All-Star Game

articles.title: Wembanyama’s opening-tip intensity, and how yet another NBA All-Star format may have clicked
articles.original_title: Wembanyama’s opening-tip intensity, and how yet another NBA All-Star format may have clicked
articles.summary: Victor Wembanyama brought the energy from opening tip of the NBA All-Star Game, and it proved infectious.  “It was a pretty good display of basketball,” Wembanyama said.  Wembanyama had been confident going in that setting the tone with competitive fire would make a difference in the league's 75th annual showcase on Sunday at Intuit Dome, the Los Angeles Clippers' year-old arena.
